name: react-fastify-template
description: Starter template using pnpm for package manager, React 19 with Tanstack Router and NodeJS with Fastify.

scripts.build: pnpm run build:client && pnpm run build:server && cp -r packages/server/build build && cp -r packages/client/dist build && pnpm run build:clean
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter server lint && pnpm --filter client lint

author: Gabriel Garcia
